jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Act as the in-house statistical expert in the team
  • Implement and analyze A/B or Multivariate Tests to provide in-depth insights on the test data
  • Detail the framework of experiments to define the most important variables for engagement and incremental transactions
  • Guide other team members on the dos and don’ts of growth experiments from a statistical lens
  • Perform retroactive analysis of new promotions, features and campaigns to evaluate their impact on GO-JEK's North Star Metrics
  • Determine the proper metrics for tracking current and future experiments
  • Develop dashboards that provide insights and visualization into channel performance relative to KPIs, projections, and historical performance
  • Present findings to senior management to drive business and strategic decisions

• BS/MS in Engineering, Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics, or equivalent experience
  • Strong analytical skills and statistical knowledge
  • Proficiency in SQL, R, Python, BigQuery and comfortable with running statistical tests
  • Ability to translate statistical concepts to business goals
  • Balance attention to detail with swift execution
  • Hustle is essential, moving quickly and executing to allow for continual iteration is a core competency of our team
